text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Draw an oval for Doraemon’s head. Draw a line, which will act as the center of it.
Add guidelines for the body. Draw a line through its center. Define the places for the eyes.
Define with guidelines the places for Doraemon’s legs. Draw its eyes.
Detail Doraemon’s cloths, eyes and nose. Add its tail, mouth and mustache.
Contour Doraemon, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
